scripts.dev: RUNTIME=bun docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.bun.yml up
scripts.migrate:create: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && bun -r run migrate:create
scripts.migrate:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && bun -r run migrate:down
scripts.migrate:init: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && bun -r run migrate:init
scripts.migrate:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && bun -r run migrate:up
